product_desc:
Live Youth Sports Network works with high schools across the U.S. Once an entire school district signs up with our company, we will outfit their school with HD Wide Angle cameras for all sporting events, at no cost to the school. Once set-up, we live stream every sporting event for each school online, and it is viewable on any device. The events are on a pay per view basis. In addition, the schools will receive a portion of the revenue generated from their school.

Revenues are genrated through pay per view sales, advertising, and sponsors. Our product increases visibility for the school, their sporting events, advertisers and sponsors, and allows college scouts the ability to scout possible recruits without being there.
high_concept: The Netflix of High School Sports
name: Live Youth Sports Network
